Name: Serpent Stone
Desc:
Obtain a clue about the power while dealing with the power of the Water Dragon. Uses the power of the Water Dragon through the clue.
Obtains 1 Serpent Stone, which is the clue of the power every time the Water Dragon skill is activated through a fight skill trigger.
Enter the Assault state that can handle the power of the Water Dragon when you consume 5 Serpent Stones. In the Assault state, Assault skills are activated instead of the Water Dragon skill as a fighting skill trigger. The Assault state is canceled when an Assault skill is used once. The effect of the increased buff duration does not apply to the Assault state duration.
In Auto-Use Mode, Serpent Stones are automatically used when you get 5 Serpent Stones.
Auto Use Mode On/Off: Right-click
